prompts: Create a dragon-like Pokemon with green scales and red accents flying over a desert landscape.
I want a Pokemon that resembles an insect with large wings and a vibrant green color scheme.
Generate an image of a Pokemon that thrives in sandy habitats, showcasing its agility and speed.
Make a whimsical Pokemon design featuring a scaly creature with a long tail and bright red eyes.
Imagine a creature that blends into forest environments, with features that help it camouflage effectively.
Design a unique Pokemon that can manipulate wind, with a sleek body and elongated wings.
Show me a flying-type Pokemon with a playful personality, darting between the trees in a sunny meadow.
